cast.name: 帕特里克·茂顿 Patrick Muldoon
斯派克·斯潘塞 Spike Spencer
索菲亚·罗新斯基 Sofia Rosinsky

introduction: Every teenage girl wants a horse and a BFF with a sense for fashion and teenage dynamics. Kristen is the luckiest 13-year-old in the world - she has it all. Moving away from the city and her best buddy Ashley, Kristen and her father arrive at Grandma Pearl's country ranch. Now Kristen has to adjust to a new life on the ranch, to new friends and a totally different style of fashion. With the help of her new BFF - a talking horse named Stanford, she's finally fitting in. Stanford, being a beauty himself, helps Kristen out as they become inseparable. But, sometimes even best friends can be a little bit jealous of other friends, too.
